==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|sort=きょう|yomi=irr}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=きょう}}. Originally a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=きょう|此|tr1=ke|t1=this|日|tr2=hu|t2=day}}. {{IPAchar|/ke<sub>1</sub>hu/}}: {{IPAchar|/kepu/}} → {{IPAchar|/keɸu/}} → {{IPAchar|/kewu/}} → {{IPAchar|/keu/}} → {{IPAchar|/kjoː/}}

The initial {{IPAchar|/ke/}} is an alternative form of the initial {{IPAchar|/ko/}} ({{l|ja|此}}, “this”) seen in words such as {{m|ja|ここ|tr=koko||this place → here}} or {{m|ja|これ|tr=kore||this [nominal] → this}}, and the final {{IPAchar|/hu/}} is an [[apophonic]] form of {{m|ja|日|tr=hi||day}}. The final {{IPAchar|/eu/}} → {{IPAchar|/joː/}} sound shift is a separate but regular phonological change.

The use of the kanji {{m|ja|今||now}} instead of {{m|ja|此||this}} is an example of {{juku|sort=きょう}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|きょう|acc=a|acc_ref=DJR,NHK,SMK5|y=i}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|きょう|hhira=けふ}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|こん|yomi=o|にち}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=こんにち}} compound {{m|ltc|今日|tr=kim nyit}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''jīnrì''.

{{m|ja|呉音|sc=Latn|Goon}}, so likely the original reading of the term as first borrowed from {{etyl|ltc|-}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|こんにち|acc=a|acc_ref=DJR,NHK,SMK5|y=go}}
: In faster or more informal speech, the moraic ん is not fully pronounced.

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|こんにち}}

# [[today]], [[this]] [[day]]
# [[nowadays]]

=====Derived terms=====
* {{ja-l|今日は|こんにちは|konnichi wa}}: [[good day]]
* {{ja-l|今日様|こんにちさま|konnichi-sama}}: {{qualifier|[[poetic]] [[honorific]]}} the [[sun]]
* {{ja-l|今日的|こんにちてき|konnichiteki}}: [[modern]], [[current]]

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|こん|yomi=o|じつ}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=こんじつ}} {{m|ltc|今日|tr=kim nyit}}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''gam<sup>1</sup> jat<sup>6</sup>''.

Change in reading from ''konnichi'', keeping the earlier {{m|ja|呉音|sc=Latn|goon}} reading ''kon'' for {{ja-l|今}}, but substituting the later {{m|ja|漢音|sc=Latn|kan'on}} reading ''jitsu'' for {{ja-l|日}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|こんじつ|y=o}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|こんじつ}}

# [[today]], [[this]] [[day]]
# [[nowadays]]

=====Coordinate terms=====
* {{ja-l|一昨々日}} ({{ja-l|さきおととい}}, {{ja-l|||saki ototoi}}; {{ja-l|さきおとつい}}, {{ja-l|||saki ototsui}}; {{ja-l|いっさくさくじつ}}, {{ja-l|||issaku sakujitsu}}): three days ago
* {{ja-l|一昨日|おととい|ototoi}}: the [[day before yesterday]], two days ago
* {{ja-l|昨日|きのう|kinō}}: [[yesterday]]
* {{ja-l|明日}} ({{ja-l|あした}}, {{ja-l|||ashita}}; {{ja-l|あす}}, {{ja-l|||asu}}): [[tomorrow]]
* {{ja-l|明後日|あさって|asatte}}: the [[day after tomorrow]], two days from now
* {{ja-l|明々後日|しあさって|shiasatte}}: three days from now
* {{ja-l|弥の明後日|やのあさって|ya no asatte}}: three days from now; {{qualifier|dialectal}} four days from now
* {{ja-l|今朝|けさ|kesa}}: this morning
* {{ja-l|今晩|こんばん|konban}}: this evening
* {{ja-l|今夜|こんや|kon'ya}}: tonight
